title: Believe Me, It's You
description: Eva Porter is a 32 year old woman starting her life over. Her marriage was wrought with betrayal and disappointment, ending both her dreams of true love and her career. She's starting over as a ghostwriter to the rich and famous, and she's beginning to put the pieces of her life back together. This time around, it's going to be exactly the way she wants it to be.Enter Dylan Moore, 21 year old megastar and pop sensation, object of desire for millions of girls and loaded with charisma. When he asks Eva if she'd be interested in ghostwriting his autobiography, she sees a quick path to career success. Unfortunately, she also sees potential heartache as her feelings for Dylan begin to go beyond a writer/client relationship. Is this gorgeous young man her ticket to success, or a one way ride to heartbreak?One thing's for certain-Dylan Moore is hard to resist.
author: S.A. Cook
